itemselectr 0.1
  • Reference

Create norms for psychological or educational tests

make.norms.Rd

Creates percentiles, McCall T-scores (M = 50, SD = 10) and stanines (M = 5, SD = 2)

Usage

make.norms(xsum)

Arguments

xsum

A vector or raw total scores for a test (no missing data)

Examples

# Create norms for the Neuroticism Scale of the bfi
library(psych)
data(bfi)
bfi <- na.omit(bfi)
Ntotal <- rowSums(bfi[16:20])  

make.norms(Ntotal)

#>          6        4.1      33       2
#>          7        6.9      35       2
